functions.label: ContentListProvider
description:
Main provider component for content list functionality, including data fetching
(via React Query) and sorting.

Props like `dataSource` and `features` should be stable references to avoid
unnecessary re-renders. Configuration from `features.sorting` is read once at
mount; use a `key` prop to remount if you need to change initial sort dynamically.
signature: ({ children, dataSource, labels, item, isReadOnly, id, queryKeyScope: queryKeyScopeProp, features, }:

children.label:
{
  children,
  dataSource,
  labels,
  item,
  isReadOnly,
  id,
  queryKeyScope: queryKeyScopeProp,
  features = {},
}

functions.label: useContentListConfig
description:
Hook to access the content list configuration context.

This is a low-level hook that provides access to configuration and support flags.
For most use cases, prefer the feature-specific hooks like `useContentListItems`,
`useContentListSort`, etc.
returnComment: The content list context including configuration and support flags.

functions.label: useContentListItems
description: Hook to access the current list of items and loading state.
signature: <Record<string, unknown>>[]; totalItems: number; isLoading: boolean; error: Error | undefined; refetch: () => void; }
returnComment: Object containing items, totalItems, isLoading, error, and refetch.

functions.label: useContentListSort
description:
Hook to access and control sorting functionality.

Use this hook when you need to read or update the sort configuration.
When sorting is disabled via `features.sorting: false`, `setSort` becomes a no-op
and `isSupported` returns `false`.
returnComment: Object containing field, direction, setSort function, and isSupported flag.

interfaces.label: ContentListFeatures
description: Feature configuration for enabling/customizing content list capabilities.

children.label: sorting
description: Sorting configuration.

interfaces.label: ContentListItemConfig
description: Per-item configuration for link behavior and actions.

children.label: getHref
description:
Function to generate the href for an item link.
When provided, item titles become clickable links.

interfaces.label: ContentListLabels
description:
User-facing labels for the content type.

These should be i18n-translated strings for display in the UI.

children.label: entity
description: Singular form of the entity name (e.g., "dashboard"). Should be i18n-translated.

children.label: entityPlural
description: Plural form of the entity name (e.g., "dashboards"). Should be i18n-translated.

children.label: searchPlaceholder
description: Placeholder text for the search input. Should be i18n-translated.

interfaces.label: ContentListSupports
description:
Resolved feature support flags.

These flags represent the **effective** availability of features after evaluating:
- Explicit configuration (e.g., `features.sorting: true` or `features.sorting: { ... }`)
- Implicit enablement (e.g., providing required services enabling a feature)
- Explicit disablement (e.g., `features.sorting: false` overrides defaults)
- Implicit disablement (e.g., missing services)

Use these flags to conditionally render UI elements or enable functionality based on
what's actually available, rather than checking raw configuration values.

children.label: sorting
description: Whether sorting is supported.

interfaces.label: DataSourceConfig
description: Data source configuration properties.

children.label: findItems
description: Fetches items from the data source.

children.label: onFetchSuccess
description: Called after successful fetch.

interfaces.label: FindItemsParams
description: Parameters for the `findItems` function.

children.label: searchQuery
description: Search query text with filter syntax already extracted.

children.label: filters
description: Active filters.

children.label: sort
description:
Sort configuration.

When sorting is disabled via `features.sorting: false`, this will be `undefined`.
Implementations should return items in their natural order (e.g., server default).

children.label: page
description: Pagination configuration.

children.label: signal
description: AbortSignal for request cancellation.

interfaces.label: FindItemsResult
description: Result from the `findItems` function.

children.label: items
description: Items for the current page.

children.label: total
description: Total matching items for pagination.

interfaces.label: SortField
description:
Simplified sort field definition.

The Sort component auto-generates asc/desc options from this definition.

children.label: field
description: Field to sort by (must match data field name).

children.label: name
description: Display name for the field (used to generate default labels).

children.label: ascLabel
description: Custom label for ascending sort (overrides auto-generated label).

children.label: descLabel
description: Custom label for descending sort (overrides auto-generated label).

interfaces.label: SortingConfig
description:
Sorting configuration.

Use `fields` for the simpler API where asc/desc options are auto-generated.
Use `options` for full control over each dropdown option.

children.label: fields
description: Simplified sortable fields - auto-generates asc/desc options for each field.

children.label: options
description:
Explicit sort options with full control over labels.
Ignored if `fields` is provided.

children.label: initialSort
description: Initial sort state.

interfaces.label: SortOption
description: Sort option definition with explicit label, field, and direction.

children.label: label
description: Display label for the sort option.

children.label: field
description: Field to sort by.

children.label: direction
description: Sort direction.

interfaces.label: UseContentListSortReturn
description: Return type for the `useContentListSort` hook.

children.label: field
description: Current sort field name.

children.label: direction
description: Current sort direction.

children.label: setSort
description: Updates the sort configuration. No-op if sorting is disabled.

children.label: isSupported
description: Whether sorting is supported (enabled via features).

misc.label: ContentListConfig
description: Complete configuration for a content list.

misc.label: ContentListCoreConfig
description: Core configuration - entity metadata and base settings.

misc.label: ContentListIdentity
description:
Identity configuration for content lists.

At least one of `id` or `queryKeyScope` must be provided:

- **`id` only**: `queryKeyScope` is derived as `${id}-listing`. Use when you want a simple
  identifier that also serves as the cache key base.

- **`queryKeyScope` only**: Use when you only need cache isolation without a semantic identifier.

- **Both**: `queryKeyScope` is used for caching/persistence, `id` is available for other
  purposes (e.g., `data-test-subj`, analytics).
signature: { id: string; queryKeyScope?: string | undefined; } | { id?: string | undefined; queryKeyScope: string; }

misc.label: ContentListItem
description:
Standardized item structure for rendering components (tables, grids, etc.).

This is the common interface that all rendering components work with,
regardless of the underlying datasource type. The `findItems` function
in `DataSourceConfig` must return items in this format.
signature: T & { id: string; title: string; description?: string | undefined; type?: string | undefined; updatedAt?: Date | undefined; }

misc.label: ContentListProviderProps
description: Props for the `ContentListProvider` component.

misc.label: FindItemsFn
description: Function signature for fetching items from a data source.

objects.label: contentListKeys
description:
Query keys for content list items.

Uses `queryKeyScope` (a stable identifier) to prevent cache collisions.
Intentionally does not use user-facing labels (which may be i18n-translated)
to ensure cache stability across locales.

children.label: all
description:
/**
   * Base query key for all content list queries.
   *
   * @param queryKeyScope - Stable scope identifier for cache isolation.
   */

children.label: items
description:
/**
   * Query key for items queries with specific parameters.
   *
   * @param queryKeyScope - Stable scope identifier for cache isolation.
   * @param params - Query parameters (search, filters, sort, page).
   */
